contactPage.title: Contact us
contactPage.description: Have a question? Our team is here to help.
contactPage.formDescription: We'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contactPage.faqDescription: Find answers to the most common questions

faq.a1: We typically respond within 24 hours during business days (Monday to Friday, 9am-6pm).
faq.q2: How can I start a free trial?
faq.a2: Click on the "Free trial" button at the top of the page to access our registration form. No credit card required.
faq.a3: Yes, you can call us Monday to Friday from 9am to 6pm. We're happy to chat with you.
faq.q4: Can I get a personalized demo?
faq.a4: Absolutely! Contact us and we'll arrange a demo tailored to your specific needs.

teamPage.title: Our team
teamPage.description: A passionate team dedicated to simplifying your stay management.
teamPage.whoWeAreText1: Biloki was born from the desire to simplify and automate stay management for modern concierge services and property owners. Our team combines technical expertise with in-depth knowledge of the vacation rental industry.
teamPage.whoWeAreText2: We believe in artificial intelligence as a co-pilot to optimize your time and improve your guests' experience. Every day, we work to make your management smoother, more intuitive, and more efficient.

careersPage.title: Join our team
careersPage.description: We're looking for talented individuals passionate about revolutionizing property management.
careersPage.whyJoinUsText: At Biloki, we're creating a solution that truly transforms the vacation rental industry. Our team members are at the heart of this mission. We offer an environment where innovation is encouraged, where everyone can grow, and where their impact is measurable.
careersPage.benefit1Description: Work on a solution used by hundreds of concierges. Your work makes a real difference.
careersPage.benefit2Description: We invest in our team's development with training, mentoring, and career advancement opportunities.
careersPage.benefit3Description: Join a passionate and supportive team where collaboration and mutual support are core values.
careersPage.benefit4Description: Hybrid work, flexible hours, and a genuine focus on employee well-being.
careersPage.ctaDescription: Send us your application with your CV and cover letter. We'd love to discuss your ambitions!
careersPage.emptyTitle: No job openings available at the moment.
careersPage.emptySubtitle: Please check back soon or send a spontaneous application.

referralPage.title: Biloki Referral Program
referralPage.description: Recommend Biloki to your contacts and enjoy exclusive benefits
referralPage.step1Desc: Receive your unique referral link and share it with your professional contacts
referralPage.step2Desc: Your referrals create their Biloki account and subscribe to a plan
referralPage.step3Desc: Receive your benefits as soon as your referral activates their subscription
referralPage.benefitsDescription: Each successful referral gives you access to exclusive benefits
referralPage.benefit1You: 1 month free subscription for each referral
referralPage.readyToReferDesc: Log in to your account to access your referral link

faq.q1: How many people can I refer?
faq.a1: There's no limit! You can refer as many people as you want and stack the rewards.
faq.q2: When will I receive my reward?
faq.a2: Your reward is activated as soon as your referral subscribes to a paid plan and the first payment is validated.
faq.q3: Does my referral need to use my link?
faq.a3: Yes, your referral must sign up through your unique referral link for the referral to be validated.
faq.q4: Can I refer an existing customer?
faq.a4: No, the referral program is reserved for new customers who have never had a Biloki account.

cgv.title: Terms and Conditions
cgv.section1Content: These Terms and Conditions govern the provision of software solutions and associated services offered by Biloki (the "Company") to its professional clients (the "Client"). Any order or use of our services implies unreserved acceptance of these Terms.

section2Items.platform: "Platform": all PMS modules, channel manager, messaging, reporting, etc.
section2Items.services: "Services": access to the Platform, updates, support, and optional services.
section2Items.contract: "Contract": the quote or subscription taken out by the Client and these Terms.

section3Items.access: Access to the Platform in SaaS mode for the duration of the Contract.
section3Items.support: Support according to the level provided in the chosen offer.
section3Items.additional: Additional services (onboarding, training, support) if included in the quote.

section4Items.prices: Prices are indicated excluding taxes and specified in the quote or pricing page.
section4Items.billing: Monthly or annual billing depending on the option chosen; payment at maturity.
section4Items.delay: Any late payment may result in suspension of access and application of legal penalties.
section4Items.evolution: Prices may change annually; any modification is notified at least 30 days before coming into effect.

section5Items.info: Provide accurate information and keep payment methods up to date.
section5Items.compliance: Ensure compliance of content and data with applicable regulations.
section5Items.rights: Respect third-party rights and authorized use of the Platform.
section5Items.security: Ensure the security of access (identifiers, passwords) and report any incident.

cgv.section6Content: Support is available through the channels and schedules specified in the offer. The Company may schedule planned interruptions for maintenance, notified within a reasonable time when possible.
cgv.section7Content: The Company implements reasonable means to ensure continuous availability of the Platform. Performance may be affected by external factors (networks, third-party providers, force majeure).
cgv.section8Content: The Platform, its components, and all intellectual property rights remain the exclusive property of the Company. The Client has a non-exclusive, non-transferable right of use limited to the Contract.

section9Items.compliance: Each party acts in compliance with applicable regulations (including GDPR).
section9Items.processor: The Company acts as a processor for data processed on behalf of the Client.
section9Items.measures: Reasonable technical and organizational measures are implemented to protect data.

cgv.section10Content: Each party undertakes to keep confidential non-public information received from the other party, except for legal obligation or request from a competent authority.
cgv.section11Content: The Company may use subcontractors for the execution of the Contract, particularly for hosting, payments, or specific services, in compliance with security and confidentiality obligations.

section12Items.duration: The Contract is concluded for the duration provided in the quote or subscription.
section12Items.termination: Each party may terminate in case of serious breach not remedied 30 days after notification.
section12Items.consequences: In case of termination, amounts already invoiced remain due; access may be suspended at maturity.

section13Items.obligation: The Company is bound by an obligation of means.
section13Items.limit: Total liability is limited to the amount paid by the Client over the last 12 months.
section13Items.exclusion: Indirect damages are excluded (loss of revenue, data, opportunities).

cgv.section14Content: Neither party shall be held liable for a breach due to a force majeure event under French law. Obligations are suspended for the duration of the event.
cgv.section15Content: Any contractual notification must be made in writing, by email or mail to the address indicated by each party, and will be deemed received on the date of sending.
cgv.section16Content: These Terms are governed by French law. Any dispute relating to their interpretation or execution shall fall under the exclusive jurisdiction of the Paris courts, unless otherwise required by mandatory law.
cgv.section17Content: For any questions about these Terms or to exercise your rights, you can contact us at:

legalNotice.title: Legal Notice

legalNotice.intro: In accordance with articles 6-III and 19 of law nÂ°2004-575 of June 21, 2004 on Confidence in the Digital Economy (LCEN), here is the identity of the stakeholders of the Biloki website and platform.

legalNotice.section5Content: The entire website, platform, applications, content, software, algorithms, databases, trademarks, logos, and graphic elements are the exclusive property of Biloki, unless otherwise stated. Any unauthorized reproduction, representation, extraction, or exploitation is strictly prohibited.
legalNotice.section6Content: Personal data collected is processed in accordance with applicable regulations, including GDPR. For more information, consult the Privacy Policy available on the website.
legalNotice.section7Content: The website may contain links to third-party sites. Biloki has no control over these sites and disclaims all responsibility for their content or operation.
legalNotice.section8Content: These legal notices are governed by French law. Any dispute falls under the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts within the jurisdiction of Biloki's headquarters.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.section1Content: We use cookies and trackers to ensure the proper functioning of the Biloki website and platform, measure audience, improve user experience, and, when you accept, personalize certain content.

section2Items.technical: Technical cookies: essential for operation (authentication, security, basic preferences).
section2Items.analytics: Audience measurement: traffic and performance statistics.
section2Items.personalization: Personalization: remembering certain display or navigation preferences.

cookies.section3Content: Strictly necessary cookies are based on our legitimate interest in providing a secure and functional service. Audience and personalization cookies are placed based on your consent, which you can withdraw at any time.
cookies.section4Content:
Durations vary depending on the purpose:
- Technical cookies: session duration or a few months maximum
- Audience measurement: generally 13 months
- Personalization: up to 13 months
cookies.section5Content: You can manage your preferences via the cookie banner (when present) or from your browser settings (blocking, deleting, alert before deposit). Refusing technical cookies may degrade certain essential features.
cookies.section6Content: Some cookies may come from third-party providers (e.g., analytics tools). We strive to limit these deposits and choose partners offering adequate data protection guarantees.
cookies.section7Content: For any questions regarding cookies or data protection, you can write to us at:

cookieBanner.message: We use cookies to ensure the site works properly, measure audience and improve your experience.

step1.description: A booking comes in via Airbnb, Booking or directly

step2.title: Automatic generation
step2.description: Biloki generates a unique code for this stay

step3.title: Scheduled activation
step3.description: The code activates 2h before arrival and deactivates at checkout

step4.title: Sent to guest
step4.description: The code is automatically sent by email, SMS and on the guest interface

cta.title: Ready to automate your access?
cta.description: Integrate your smart locks with Biloki and manage all your access codes automatically.

calendars.title: Sync all your calendars with the
calendars.description: Easily connect Biloki with major booking platforms to automatically sync your calendars and avoid double bookings.

platforms.title: Connect with the biggest booking platforms
platforms.description1: The Channel Manager is a tool that allows you to connect all your listings on booking platforms like Airbnb, Booking.com, Vrbo, and Expedia.
platforms.description2: It automatically syncs your availability, reservations, calendars and rates across major channels, without having to manually update each calendar. All centralized from your vacation rental software.

centralized.title: All your bookings in one place
centralized.description1: Biloki imports all reservations you receive from external booking channels into your centralized platform. With the Channel Manager, you can manage all your bookings from a single place.
centralized.description2: Our software automatically updates availability and rates across all sites. This way you avoid the risk of double bookings that could compromise your short-term rental business.

visibility.title: More visibility for more bookings
visibility.description1: Add your listings to more portals via iCal integration to gain visibility and receive more bookings. You can export your listings, reservations and rates in minutes.
visibility.description2: Publish your accommodations on all major platforms and maximize your occupancy rate.

benefits.title: Benefits of Biloki's Channel Manager
benefits.subtitle: Automate your management and save precious time

sync.title: Instant synchronization
sync.description: No more double bookings! One reservation updates all your platforms automatically.

time.title: Save up to 20h/week
time.description: The Channel Manager automates repetitive tasks like updating availability and calendars.

centralize.title: Centralize your bookings
centralize.description: No need to switch between platforms. Bidirectional API integrations sync everything automatically.

commission.title: Offset commissions
commission.description: Adjust your rates on certain platforms to cover fees charged on each booking.

visibility.title: Boost your visibility
visibility.description: Publish your properties on more platforms, easily export your data and optimize your listings.

calendar.title: Centralized calendar
calendar.description: View and manage all your bookings from a single calendar, modify rates and availability in one click.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions about Channel Manager

what.question: What is a Channel Manager?
what.answer: A Channel Manager is a software tool that allows you to manage all your listings across multiple booking platforms from one place. It automatically syncs your availability, rates and reservations to avoid double bookings.

syncTime.question: How long does it take to sync my reservations?
syncTime.answer: Your reservations are automatically synced on Biloki's Channel Manager and all your external listings within minutes, or instantly for direct API connections.

platforms.question: Which platforms can I connect?
platforms.answer: Biloki connects with major platforms: Airbnb, Booking.com, Vrbo, Expedia and more than 120 other OTAs via iCal. You can manage all your listings from a single interface.

doubleBooking.question: Does the Channel Manager really prevent double bookings?
doubleBooking.answer: Yes! Real-time synchronization automatically blocks dates on all your platforms as soon as a booking is confirmed, eliminating the risk of double booking.

cta.title: Ready to accept more bookings?
cta.description: No setup fees or credit card required. No commitment. Try Biloki free for 1 month.

ota.title: OTA
ota.description: Connect to more than {count} major booking platforms: {platforms} and many others.

platforms.title: {count}+ connected platforms
platforms.description: Distribute your listings on {platforms} and more than {otherCount} other international platforms. Maximize your visibility.

oneClick.title: One-click connection
oneClick.description: Connect your OTA accounts in seconds. Our system automatically retrieves your existing listings and syncs all information.

performance.title: Performance by channel
performance.description: Analyze each platform's performance: number of bookings, revenue generated, conversion rate. Identify your most profitable channels.

sync.title: Automatic synchronization
sync.description: All bookings, modifications and cancellations are synced in real-time. Guest data is automatically retrieved.

cta.title: Multiply your visibility
cta.description: Connect all your platforms and manage them from a single interface.
